H0.text: Cells form a cell wall is the statement that explains how humans grow, as humans grow and their bodies change.

H1.text: Cells increase in size explains how humans grow, as humans grow their bodies change.

H2.text: Cells undergo cell division, which explains how humans grow as their bodies change.

H3.text: Cells merge to become larger explains how humans grow as their bodies change.

A4.text: After growth from the zygote to the adult, cell division by mitosis allows for continual construction and repair of the organism.

A5.text: The human body experiences about 10 quadrillion cell divisions in a lifetime.
